dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, seriously, is Tesla finally, like, getting its butt kicked, or what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, seriously, is Tesla finally, like, getting its butt kicked, or what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, you mean with Lucid snagging, um, Peter Hochholdinger? I saw that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, you mean with Lucid snagging, um, Peter Hochholdinger? I saw that!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Silicon Valley-based Lucid said that Peter Hochholdinger has joined the company as vice president of manufacturing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! I mean, this guy, he was Tesla's VP of Production. He was production, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! I mean, this guy, he was Tesla's V P of Production. He was production, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hochholdinger was previously Teslas vice president of production, a role hed held since May 2016

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For sure! And, uh, apparently, he bailed right after that whole "manufacturing hell" Model 3 ramp-up. Like, seriously turbulent period.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure! And, uh, apparently, he bailed right after that whole manufacturing hell Model three ramp-up. Like, seriously turbulent period.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hochholdinger was previously Teslas vice president of production, a role hed held since May 2016, a turbulent period marked by what CEO Elon Musk dubbed the manufacturing hell of ramping up Model 3 output.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And now he's at Lucid, this luxury EV startup, and their CEO is, like, ex-Tesla Model S engineer. It's too perfect.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And now he's at Lucid, this luxury E V startup, and their C E O is, like, ex-Tesla Model S engineer. It's too perfect.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lucid Motors, a startup maker of luxury electric cars that plans to start building its first model next year, hired a veteran Tesla manufacturing executive... Led by Peter Rawlinson, an engineer who helped develop Teslas breakthrough Model S sedan

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's totally perfect! And the rumors are he clashed with Musk over production strategies. I mean, wouldn't you?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's totally perfect! And the rumors are he clashed with Musk over production strategies. I mean, wouldn't you?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! After 24 years at Audi, then that chaos? Uh, yeah, you'd clash.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! After twenty four years at Audi, then that chaos? Uh, yeah, you'd clash.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Before joining Tesla, he spent 24 years at Audi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Lucid's saying he's empowered to create "industry-leading manufacturing." Like, a direct dig.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Lucid's saying he's empowered to create industry-leading manufacturing. Like, a direct dig.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In joining Lucid, Peter is empowered to create an industry-leading manufacturing process that will deliver the quality products our discerning customers demand and deserve.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A total dig! And their car, the Air, is supposed to be more premium than the Model S. Over $100K.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A total dig! And their car, the Air, is supposed to be more premium than the Model S. Over one hundred dollarsK.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Air, which Lucid has been developing for more than three years, is to be even more premium than Teslas Model S, priced from over $100,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, by the way, they've got over a billion dollars for, from the Saudi fund, right? Remember Musk's tweet about funding secured?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, by the way, they've got over a billion dollars for, from the Saudi fund, right? Remember Musk's tweet about funding secured?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lucid has raised more than $1 billion to get into production, with Saudi Arabias public investment fund signing on as a major backer in September 2018

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I so remember that! The SEC fines, the whole thing. This is, uh, just adding insult to injury.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I so remember that! The S E C fines, the whole thing. This is, uh, just adding insult to injury.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: (Teslas CEO lost his chairmanship as a result of his inaccurate tweets and both he and the company were fined by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.)

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, exactly! And all these other players, VW, Audi, Rivian, they're all coming for Tesla now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, exactly! And all these other players, V W, Audi, Rivian, they're all coming for Tesla now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: companies ranging from global powerhouses Volkswagen, Audi, General Motors, Nissan, Renault, Jaguar Land Rover and Volvo to startups including Rivian, Byton and Nio all planning battery-powered to compete with Tesla.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's like, the floodgates are open. Tesla's been losing executives, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like, the floodgates are open. Tesla's been losing executives, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Executive turnover has been unusually high at Tesla in the past few years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like, the Autopilot guy last month. This isn't just a one-off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like, the Autopilot guy last month. This isn't just a one-off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last month, a key member of its Autopilot team left to lead the development of visual perception technology for Embark, a startup developing self-driving trucks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, what do you think? Is this the beginning of the end for Tesla's dominance, or what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what do you think? Is this the beginning of the end for Tesla's dominance, or what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Um, it's definitely a big deal. For Lucid, it's huge. For Tesla? It's another, uh, warning shot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Um, it's definitely a big deal. For Lucid, it's huge. For Tesla? It's another, uh, warning shot.
